column5: The Spoonbill is located in the Heart of Crystal Beach where a short stroll you'll have sand in your toes! With a 2,000 sq ft mezzanine, you can enjoy your vacation even if it rains! Perfect for families, group get-a-way and larger events such as family reunions and weddings.  PLEASE NOTE: Pricing may be different than AirBnB lists, but is typically close, except summer rates are about 20% higher. We will add tax which is 6% and there is a 15% fee for holidays and special events.
